content: To become an AI Engineer, download the AI Engineering Skills Checklist provided by Marina Wyss.
Marina Wyss is a Senior Applied Scientist at Twitch/Amazon, combining roles similar to a Data Scientist and Machine Learning Engineer.
Marina Wyss also works as a 1:1 career coach, focusing on helping individuals from non-traditional backgrounds enter the AI field.
The views and opinions expressed by Marina Wyss in her videos are her own and do not represent the official policy or position of Twitch/Amazon or any other company she has worked for.
All advice and insights shared by Marina Wyss are based on her personal experiences and should be considered as such.
